text: Pays-de-Clerval is a commune. It is in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in the Doubs department in east France. == History == The municipality was created on 1 January 2017 and consists of the former communes of Clerval (the seat) and Santoche.Arrêté préfectoral 9 August 2016 On 1 January 2019, the former commune of Chaux-lès-Clerval was merged into Pays-de-Clerval.Arrêté préfectoral 17 December 2018 == Related pages == * Communes of the Doubs department == References == Category:2017 establishments in France Category:Communes in Doubs
title: Pays-de-Clerval
